name: Portfolio
description: I built this portfolio 100% from sratch using React. This was my first introduction to Sass.

name: Maze Game
description: I built this app with a team of 5 during my time in MSU FullStack Web Development Bootcamp. Its built with a front end using handlebars to template and a mix of MySql2 and express.js to handle the backend.

name: ConnectMates
description: ConnectMates is an app I built with 4 teamates, using React on the frontend with graphql queries to the backend. The backend is built on apollo and serves up a MongoDb database.

name: ReadMe Generator
description: This ReadMe generator was built during my time in bootcamp. It uses the command line to build a ReadMe for any project.

name: Weather App
description: I built this app during my time in MSU FullStack Web Development bootcamp. Its built with strait javascript, Html, and Css.
